summary: Iteration 7 - Post CSS centering fix validation and full UI testing. All 14 requested features verified working. Landing page centering confirmed fixed - hero text, CTA buttons, and presale progress card all centered correctly on desktop (1920px). Presale form validation, price calculation, referral code prefill, mobile responsive layout, and navigation all working perfectly.
critical_code_review_comments: Centering bug fixed - @layer base directive properly scopes global styles without overriding Tailwind utilities like mx-auto
Dark theme (#0A0A0A) applied correctly via Tailwind v4 @theme tokens
Violet primary (#8B5CF6) used consistently on CTAs and accent elements
All pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
API integration with /api/presale/progress working - shows real data ($1K raised, 5 participants, $2.00M goal)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features working. CSS centering bug confirmed fixed. Production deployment configs (vercel.json, _redirects, nginx.conf) ready. Wallet dropdown menu can only be fully tested with Phantom extension installed.
